Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293T cell line expressing a wild-type and mutant form of P53.

Readout description.Result Description: For the variant NM_000546.5:c.870A>G, there was a significant reduction in P53 protein expression compared to the wild-type control.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used to compare the mean protein expression levels between wild-type and mutant P53 samples.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: P53 protein expression greater than 80% of wild-type control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: P53 protein expression less than 50% of wild-type control.
